text:
Food Waste

New York state provides higher education institutions with the following equations to determine the amount of food they are wasting.

Residential Institutions Model

Food waste (lbs/yr) = 0.35 lbs/meal * N of students * 405 meals/student/yr

Non-Residential Institutions Model (e.g., community colleges)

Food waste (lbs/yr) = 0.35 lbs/meal * N of students * 108 meals/student/yr

The dining manager of a college has asked for your help to revise and improve the food waste model used by universities in New York State.
Recreate this initial model in your Workspace
